mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOAT_VACATION(GVNUM, GVTYPE, GVREASONS, GVSTARTDATE, GVENDDATE, GVSUBJECT, GVMEMO , INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE, DELETEYN, GENUM, WRITER, GEHP, REFERENCE, APPROVER, DEPT, PROVAL, COUNT, DECIANOTHER ) VALUES( #{gvnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gvtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gvreasons, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gvstartdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gvenddate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gvsubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gvmemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE. 'Y', #{genum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gehp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reference, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approver, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proval, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{edcianother, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
